info.comment:
I'm very exicted to be here, and make my first project! Thanks for using Scratch. If you have any other questions, regarding this account or me, feel free to ask them! Thank you, and Scratch on!
~Scratch
EDIT: Glitches fixed! Thank you for mentioning them.
info.author: -ScratchCat-

contents: What will you do to help?
I want to be your friend. Will you add me to your friends list?
Will you be active on the site?
What kind of projects will you make?

scripts: What will you do to help?
I want to be your friend. Will you add me to your friends list?
Will you be active on the site?
What kind of projects will you make?
I'm Scratch Cat. As you may've noticed, this is also my new account
I'd like you let you know...
I'm a user and fan of Scratch!
So I'm controlled by them, on this account.
Who's the user? I don't think that really matters...
The user Penguinsrock, has decided to create this account to help others.
Feel free to ask me ANY Scratch related question!
Unless I am ONLINE, please comment on Penguinsrock's projects.
Any questions? Type it EXACTLY like in the box
What will you do to help?
I will make tutorials, answer your questions, and other things to help the community!
I want to be your friend. Will you add me to your friends list?
Sure thing! I'll add anybody. But if you are not following the rules well, then I may remove you. Sorry.
Will you be active on the site?
I will try to be active, but don't forget to leave comments for me or Penguinsrock.
What kind of projects will you make?
Tutorials, small animations/games, annoucements, and more!
OK! If you have a question regarding this account, that's not listed, feel free to comment HERE! Bye!
What will you do to help?
I want to be your friend.Will you add me to your friends list?
Will you be active on the site?
What kind of projects will you make?
I do not understand. May you repeat that?
